Content Title: Exploring the Future of Development with GitHub Copilot Workspace
Content Description: Explore GitHubâ€™s Copilot Workspace, a task-centric, AI-driven environment designed to help you improve every step of your coding process. Learn how to initiate tasks from issues, refine pull requests, and create new repositories using natural language. With integrated terminals for validation, session sharing for collaboration, and configurable workflows, Copilot Workspace gives you the tools to optimize your development process, enhance productivity, and foster teamwork.

This course equips you with the knowledge needed to efficiently maintain your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) services and prepare for the OCI Cloud Operations Professional (1Z0-1067-23) certification. It offers comprehensive guidance on various day-to-day operational tasks within the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure ecosystem. Beginning with an exploration of automation tools such as OCI CLI, Terraform, Resource Manager, and Ansible, you'll progress to tackling operational responsibilities like managing custom images, overseeing OS functions, optimizing network traffic, implementing security best practices, and addressing troubleshooting scenarios. You'll gain expertise in planning scaling operations, setting up alerts, efficiently managing expenses in your environment, and effectively resolving any encountered issues. The course facilitates hands-on learning through self-paced labs, enabling you to continually enhance your cloud skills.

This course was created by Oracle University. We are pleased to host this training in our library.
